edu.mills.tabletopbuddy

Class LibraryDBUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mills.tabletopbuddy.LibraryDBUtilities

  • public class LibraryDBUtilities
extends Object
    Allows for methods to query the database for a game, add or remove a game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Game getGame(SQLiteDatabase db, int gameId)
      Retrieves game from local database based on the row id.
      static int getLibraryIdIfExists(SQLiteDatabase db, int bggId)
      Checks for a game in the local database and, if it exists, retrieves its local id number.
      static long insertGame(SQLiteDatabase db, Game game)
      Inserts game into the local database.
      static void removeGameByBGGId(SQLiteDatabase db, Integer bggId)
      Removes a game from the local database.
      static void removeGameByLibraryId(SQLiteDatabase db, Integer libraryId)
      Removes a game from the local database by the id of the row.
